mapper.sql: id, stock_taking_id, goods_code, goods_name, inventory_state, qty, plan_qty, real_qty, reason
mapper.insert:
insert into bops_stock_taking_item
id,
stock_taking_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
inventory_state,
qty,
plan_qty,
real_qty,
reason,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{stockTakingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inventoryState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{planQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update bops_stock_taking_item
stock_taking_id = #{stockTakingId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inventory_state = #{inventoryState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_qty = #{planQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_qty = #{realQty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bops_stock_taking_item set stock_taking_id = #{stockTakingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inventory_state = #{inventoryState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, plan_qty = #{planQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_qty = #{realQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.stock_taking_id, a.goods_code, a.goods_name, a.inventory_state, a.qty, a.plan_qty, a.real_qty, a.reason from bops_stock_taking_item a,bops_stock_taking b where a.stock_taking_id = b.id and b.stock_taking_no=#{stockTakingNo}
